vote.text: Amendment SA 1091 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1091 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Peters. (consideration: CR S3843) To add an applicability provision.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1091 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Peters.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1091 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
